mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT b.BOARD_NO , code , category , id , title , content , write_dt , view_count , (SELECT count(*) FROM reply r WHERE yn = 1 AND b.board_no = r.board_no AND r.yn = 1 ) AS reply_count FROM board b WHERE b.yn = 1 AND code = #{code} AND category LIKE CONCAT('%', #{category}, '%') ORDER BY b.write_dt DESC ) a LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{amount}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board WHERE code = #{code} AND yn = 1
SELECT board_no FROM board WHERE code = #{code} ORDER BY board_no asc LIMIT 1
SELECT board_no FROM board WHERE code = #{code} ORDER BY board_no DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT b.board_no , b.id , b.title , b.write_dt , b.view_count , b.content , b.code , (SELECT count(BOARD_NO) FROM board_like bl WHERE b.board_no = bl.board_no ) as like_count , (SELECT count(*) FROM reply r WHERE yn = 1 AND b.board_no = r.board_no AND r.yn = 1 ) as reply_count FROM board b WHERE b.yn = 1 AND board_no = #{boardNo} AND code = 20
